column1: Article 61A of the Constitution goes as follows:-

column2: "Subject to the provisions of paragraphs (1),  (2),  (3),  (4)  and  (5)  of Article 126,

column1: no  court  or  tribunal  shall  have  power  or  jurisdiction

column2: pronounce upon or in any manner call  in  question any order or decision made
by  the  Commission,  a  Committee,  or any  public  officer,  in  pursuance  of any
power of duty conferred  or imposed  on  such  Commission,  or delegated  to a
Committee or public officer, under this Chapter or under any other law."
